dmca.title: [ADMINS] Legal Notice for copyright infringement by Angelknows.comhosted on your data
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
[mailto:planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com] On Behalf Of Women Fitness
Sent: Friday, April 01, 2005 10:27 PM
To: admins@theplanet.com
Subject: [ADMINS] Legal Notice for copyright infringement by
Angelknows.comhosted on your datacenter.


To
Lance Crosby, Esq. 
Chief Operating Officer 
1333 Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207
USA
 
Sub:Legal Notice for  Copyright Infringement for Purposes of Title 17,
Section 512, of The United States Code 
 
Sir,
One of the sites www.http://angelknows.com/ hosted on your data centre by 
Name Servers:
   ns1.pslmusic.com
   ns2.pslmusic.com
owned by 
AngelKnows,Inc
   Jingliang Li (webmaster@angelknows.com)
   +1.3153035594
   Fax: +1.3153035598
   220 Bassett St. Apt.2
   Syracuse, NY 13210
   US

It is an exact  replica of our site page by page including our personal
photos shown as owners at http://angelknows.com/wfteam.htm
I am  owner of the site www.womenfitness.net <http://www.womenfitness.net/>
for last five years and the entire content is copyright.
I request you to immediately remove this site from your hosting in next 12
hrs otherwise you shall be severally and jointly held you responsible for
all claims that we shall be forced to file on your company for Copyright
Infringement for Purposes of Title 17, Section 512, of The United States
Code
 
 
Rohit Nayyar
Bar-at-law
On behalf of proprietor
Namita Nayyar
Proprietor
WWW.WOMENFITNESS.NET <http://www.womenfitness.net/> 
E-25 New Agra
Agra
U.P.
India
 
Phones: 0091-9837025145 Mobile
             0091-9319106558 Mobile
             0091-562-2852304
             0091-562-2520136
             0091-562-3090554
